snippet.title: Asteroid-Hunter Beta
snippet.description:
Learn More Here \I/ _I_ /i\
[https://gogoroth0.wixsite.com/asteroidhunter]

Asteroid Hunter is the product of My childhood dream to build My own games.

I was laid off from My job making truck handle's
for Mill's INC, so with nothing to really do I downloaded the Unity Engine to give game development another go.

Since I was about 11 I always wanted to design My own game, I would walk around the block day dreaming, all the time about how this game and that game would look and work. Man them where good times, so young and so full of enthusiasm they where.

I first tried game design back when I was 25 while delivering pizza's. I did complete a short video lesson, yet that's as far I got tell two year's later when I decided to try again.

Now that I have built at least half of My game I'm gonna try and Make one of My other dreams come true to start a small business selling the games I make, so to all of you who have Liked,shared,donated and played My game thank you so Much.

I hope you make your dreams happen too:)
